Posts.Content: Mar 4, 2015 11:38AM Michalene wrote: New to the forum....  Thankful I finally have a place where others have walked the same walk.  I was diagnosed with triple neg stage 2b with nodes involved in Jan 2014.  Had lumpectomy, 8 rounds (4 ac 3taxol and 1taxotere) and 33 sessions of radiation.  I finished all treatment Aug 22,2015.  In November 2015 I had a clear breast mri and mammo.  I take Cymbalta for neuropathy in my feet.  For the last two weeks I have had severe back and hip pain.  I cannot sleep even with percocet. I am having a bone scan tomorrow.  Scarred for two reasons.  They find something.  Or they don't,  and then what do I do?????
Posts.Title: Bone and joint pain Hope40 dunesleeper

Posts.Content: Mar 4, 2015 11:46AM Michalene wrote: I too have neuropathy.  I have etreme foot and leg pain and numbness.  I have tried four different meds to help.  The final one is Cymbalta.  This has definately helped. Now just trying to find the right dose.  Good luck and kerp us posted
Posts.Title: Bone and joint pain Hope40 dunesleeper
